Dashon is an inspiration to anyone looking for a way to be a positive influence on the people around him.  His energy, kindness, and gracious spirit is uplifting to everyone around him.  You can feel the energy of the room change the moment Dashon walks in, and everyone is happy to see him.  You will also find him inquisitive, knowledgeable, and relentless in his pursuit to get better at his craft.If circumstances would permit it, I would have hired him a long time ago.  Don't let him get past you.

It‚Äôs my great pleasure to provide this letter of recommendation for Mr. Hawkins as he pursues a degree as a full stack web developer . As a Professor of Communication at Estrella Mountain Community College, I‚Äôve had the privilege of teaching Mr. Hawkins in my Summer 2016 class of Interpersonal Communication. Mr. Hawkins impressed me with his intellectual curiosity, passion for accomplishing task and assignments, along with his drive for learning. I know that Mr. Hawkins has the verbal skills and depth of thought to be engaging with those he works with. He‚Äôs a talented student who gives insightful observations in class discussions. Given his background I am confident that he would make an excellent addition to your organization.Mr. Hawkins is passionate about connecting with people and exploring new ideas. Beyond his studies he is a hard worker and broadens his horizons with the connections he makes with others. His self-driven appetite for learning as an engaged student in the classroom is remarkable.  Mr. Hawkins has my wholehearted support in his passion for people and technology. He‚Äôs hard-working, thoughtful, charismatic, and open-minded, and he has a clear commitment to any task given to him. I have no doubt that Mr. Hawkins will make an outstanding Employee. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me for any more information. Thank you for your time.Sincerely,Valerie De La O, M.EdCommunication Adjunct FacultyEstrella Mountain Community Collegevalerie.delao@estrellamountain.edu480-431-1909

summary: When I believe in something, I take it on wholeheartedly. As I believe in the power of transformation, I decided to make a career change after 25 years as a DJ and a small business owner. I‚Äôm finally pursuing my love for computer science as a Full Stack Web Developer/Software Engineer. My goal is to start a career in technology, learn as much as possible, and grow as a company grows. My hope is to work with a company creating a positive impact on society. I want to do what‚Äôs right and beneficial for others. I‚Äôll do this in a tech role where I can work with others, grow, learn and have fun along the way!
